Summon your wind-up Anima minion. Warning: cannot be used to teleport or upgrade weapons.<tab>In old Garlean, the word “anima” means “soul,” though some philosophers have come to use it to refer to the hidden feminine side of men. Whether this explains why Anima's lower head appears feminine is debatable, but one thing is certain: no shins are safe from this mammet's fists of fury.<tab>Distract me with your feminine wiles, and then strike when my guard is down? - Carvallain<tab>Oblivion<tab>Delivers an attack with a potency of 30 and knocks back all enemies within range.

Summon your starbird minion. Gazing up at the stars in the heavens, it ever sings a song of hope.<tab>A beautiful blue bird whose features are reminiscent of the starfaring creation Meteion. So long as hope abides in its master's heart, never shall its plumage take on the black of despair.<tab>Birds of a feather are we! - X'rhun Tia<tab>Lucky Star<tab>Instantly restores damaged ally Shield.

Summon your Nagxian cat minion. The very soul of grace and nobility, and can see souls to boot.<tab>In former times in Nagxia, the breeding of this graceful and noble cat was permitted only to royalty and high priests. Yet it was not only for these traits that it was coveted; legend holds that its blue eyes can discern the aether of all things, including departed souls.<tab>I've never beheld such grace, such elegance, such... unfathomable beauty! - Stricken Traveler<tab>Noble Ease<tab>Removes all effects from all enemies and allies within range.

Summon your brave new Urianger minion. Despite its diminutive size, its arms are no less weapons than those of the man himself.<tab>While tidying up the solar at the Rising Stones, Tataru discovered a veritable army of wind-up Uriangers─the result of a misorder. Resourceful as ever, the Scions' coinkeeper altered their hair and attire, and marketed them as a limited edition model.<tab>What thinkest thou... of mine appearance? - Urianger<tab>Sharlayan Astrology<tab>Restores 100 HP to all allies within range (150 if the ally is a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>poppet<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>).

Summon your wind-up Vrtra minion. Last of his brood but certainly not least.<tab>A mammet designed in the likeness of the great wyrm Vrtra, who is said to be possessed of a gentle heart despite his fearsome appearance. Though this recreation is somewhat less fearsome than the actual wyrm, it is not for want of effort on its part.<tab>The hour is come, Vrtra. - Estinien<tab>Sable Breath<tab>Delivers an attack with a potency of 110 to all enemies within range.

Summon your hippo calf minion. Heavy. Assisted lift may be required.<tab>Hippopotami are native to Meracydia, and scholars point to their presence in Thavnair as proof that trade thrived between the lands long ago. During the chaos of the Final Days, this calf became separated from its herd and strayed into your path in Vanaspati.<tab>Thou shalt not lift with thy back. - Ancient Wisdom<tab>Big Yawn<tab>Binds all enemies within range. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 5s

Summon your crabe de la crabe minion. If it were any crabbier, it would...probably still be a crab.<tab>Native to Thavnair, this tree-dwelling crab became known to foreign scholars when an Arkasodara clan pointed them out to a visiting crew. So exemplarily crab-like were its features, it was promptly identified as such and given a name to match.<tab>If yer playin' us false, I'll be back to feed the crabs with yer lyin' tongue. - Rostnsthal<tab>Crab Walk<tab>Renders all allies within range immune to attacks by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>monsters<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 5s

Summon your Prince Lunatender minion. Use as a decoration at risk of suffering puncture wounds─lots of them.<tab>As part of their efforts to make Smileton into a paradise, the Loporrits caught this prince among lunatenders to use as an ornamental plant. However, it was disinclined to suffer the indignity, and slipped into your bag and fled.<tab>This is sure to fetch a princely sum from Master Gegeruju! - Zhloe Aliapoh<tab>Moonbathe<tab>Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 260 to all enemies within range. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Activation Delay:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10s

Summon your tiny troll minion. The good kind that makes constructive, well-thought-out comments.<tab>Originally an inhabitant of Labyrinthos, this inquisitive young troll snuck into the Aitiascope, where it fell into the aetherial sea. There it met the souls of its ancestors─an experience that saw it mature beyond its tender years.<tab>I swear he's part forest troll... - Lightly Built Lab Assistant<tab>Sneeze<tab>Inflicts a weakness to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>monsters<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> on all enemies within range. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 15s

Summon your Caduceus minion. Won't spit acid at you, so rest easy.<tab>One of Hermes's pet creations, this intelligent serpent served as a message-bearer in Elpis. Perhaps due to his inherited memories, Amon would bestow the selfsame name upon another serpentine creation, which he dispatched to guard Dalamud.<tab>My money is on writhing snakes. - Thancred<tab>Coiling Bind<tab>Reduces ATK of all enemies within range by 40%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 6s

Summon your adventure basket minion. Because no one should have to save the world on an empty stomach.<tab>Be it a frozen waste or a volcano's fiery bowels, no matter where your adventures take you, this basket laden with tasty morsels will nourish your body while lifting your spirit. Cutlery and crockery included for your consuming convenience.<tab>This is a picnic compared to my officer training... - Dancing Wolf<tab>Picnic<tab>Increases action party DEF by 40. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10s

Summon your Golden Dhyata minion. Is it a bird? Is it a fish? No, it's a translation device!<tab>A faithful replica of the artifact being studied by Professor Rurusha, this translation device is believed to have been created in the likeness of a catfish. However, none can say why the ancients chose such a whimsical form for it.<tab>Something lost in translation, perhaps? - Jenomis<tab>Literal Translation<tab>Removes all detrimental effects from all allies within range.

Summon your greener gleaner minion. Good at hiding, but clearly not good enough.<tab>Though genomos are adept at hiding among foliage, this young specimen couldn't escape your retainer's keen eyes. Due to their predilection for small insects, Sharlayans have long bred the creatures to keep pests under control.<tab>Waiting is boring, like watching moss grow on rocks. - Vanu Scout<tab>Bloom<tab>Delivers 10 points of damage every second to all enemies within range. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 20s

Summon your wind-up Grebuloff minion. Smells vaguely like a rocky shore.<tab>One day, a Namazu craftsman was swept away in the One River. As he tumbled along the riverbed, he had a vision of a mysterious being, which he recreated in the form of this mammet. Or so your retainer reports. Could such a life-form exist somewhere out there?<tab>So you think yourself an adept enough diver to brave the depths of the sea? - Ajiro<tab>Glub Glub<tab>Reduces minion summoning recast time by 50%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10s

Summon your nosferatu minion. Nothing if not gentlemanly...and perhaps bloodthirsty.<tab>Though understood to refer to vampires, the word “nosferatu” has an uncertain origin, and the same may be said of this bat-like creature. However, from the fact that it appears to be wearing a dinner suit and won't drink your blood without permission, it is clearly a gentlemanly sort.<tab>Aren't bats just the cutest little plague-bearers you ever did see? - Bat Enthusiast<tab>Bloodsucker<tab>Changes action party auto-attacks to area of effect attacks. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 12s

Summon your wind-up herois minion. Come on, you know who this hero is.<tab>There once was a woman who selflessly served her fellow man as Azem. Even after stepping down, she continued in this mission, and went on to become a divinity that hope may endure. This mammet was made in her honor.<tab>'Tis time for action. - Ancient Hero<tab>Persona<tab>Binds all enemies within range. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 5s

Summon your wind-up Daivadipa minion. Can discern good and evil─so long as they are at knee height.<tab>A mechanical image of Daivadipa, one of the Mrga traditionally worshipped in Thavnair. In the old tongue of the Arkasodara, his name means “heavenly light” or simply “eye”─a reference to his ability to discern good and evil.<tab>Naught will escape my all-seeing eyes, no, no. - Gyoka<tab>Divine Eye<tab>Increases ATK of all allies within range by 10. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10s

Summon your royal lunatender minion. All that glitters is not gold. It could also be a lunatender.<tab>A mutation caused this lunatender to be golden in color─a trait which, while accentuating its royal lineage, rendered it easy prey on the moon's grey surface. Seeking a less harrowing life, it chose instead to become an Excitatron prize.<tab>The way she spoke, you'd think she was bloody royalty or something... - Wiscar<tab>Sunbathe<tab>Doubles the amount of HP restored to allies stationed in Gates. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 20s

Summon your wind-up Arkasodara minion. Comes with modesty covered.<tab>The Hippo Riders turned to the Great Work to create these mammets as gifts for their patrons. Garbed in a traditional Thavnairian outfit, it boasts appeal as a local souvenir, and the redoubtable merchants of Yedlihmad are eyeing ways to profit from them.<tab>Never have I felt so invigorated, to have such a mighty Arkasodara fighting by my side! - Ogul<tab>Alchemical Concoction<tab>Delivers 10 points of damage every second to all enemies within range. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 20s

Summon your wind-up kangaroo minion. Always has a spring in its step.<tab>This lifelike doll of a marsupial native to the southern continent of Meracydia was discovered by your retainer in an abandoned quarry village. The joey in its pouch seldom shows itself, but this is apparently all according to design.<tab>I have faith that you'll bounce back. - Hamon Holyfist<tab>Kangaroo Kick<tab>Delivers an attack with a potency of 60 to all enemies within range while reducing movement speed by 70%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10s

Summon your protonaught minion. The amount it can lift would put a full-grown Roegadyn to shame.<tab>A miniaturized version of an Allagan construction machina, believed to have been created as a test prototype. Like the full-sized production models, it is remarkably strong relative to its proportions and can carry far more than its own weight.<tab>Bigger is not necessarily better. - Man with a Familiar Voice<tab>Steam Clean<tab>Increases action party DEF by 40. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10s

Summon your teacup Kapikulu minion. Small but eager to work.<tab>Though charged with the Kapikulu's maintenance in the depths of Alzadaal's Legacy, this mammet was largely idle. When trespassers finally appeared in the vault, it dared to hope that it could make itself useful again, but the Kapikulu's demise led to its unemployment.<tab>I was deep in my teacups at the time, but I know what I saw! - Pungent Namazu<tab>The Satrap's Authority<tab>Renders action party immune to all attacks. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 6s

Summon your Chewy minion. Take care not to drown in its literal puppy dog eyes.<tab>A small breed of dog native to the New World, this adorable critter was brought over to Eorzea by Lominsan sailors. Inquisitive and enthusiastic, it stands ever ready to embark on an adventure with you...but never says no to a spot of frolicking.<tab>From a hound at his throat to a puppy at his heel... - Hien<tab>Winsome Woof<tab>Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

Summon your clockwork Novus D minion. Deftly driven by an unspecified (but doubtless incomparably brilliant) man.<tab>Modeled upon the popular magitek passenger vehicle Novus D, this tin toy is a favorite of Garlean children, who never tire of winding it up and watching it rattle along. A certain master engineer is said to have created it for both profit and pleasure.<tab>I must settle for crushing the ironmen's toys. - Sadu<tab>Accelerate<tab>Increases movement speed of all allies within range by 35%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 6s

Summon your hatching bunny minion. If happiness had form, it would look like this.<tab>A mammet inspired by the peculiar rabbits in Jihli Aliapoh's vision. Initially missing a core, it sprung to life by the power of the crystal brought by an actual happy bunny, and will surely lead its owner to good fortune. Probably.<tab>While I'm more of a “cat-lover,” variety is, after all, the spice of life! - Gegeruju<tab>Happiness<tab>Changes action party auto-attacks to area of effect attacks. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 12s

Summon your wind-up Azeyma minion. For those who like it scorching hot.<tab>While traveling through the desert in search of divine beauty, a goldsmith inadvertently wandered into the phantom realm. Though unsure if he was dreaming, he later crafted this automaton based on the woman he glimpsed within, imbuing it with her fiery grace.<tab>Let the fires rage! - Azeyma<tab>Fiery Fan<tab>Increases ATK of all allies within range by 20 (40 if the ally is a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>poppet<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>). <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 6s

Summon your wind-up <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var> minion. Loporrit crew not included, delightful though that would be.<tab>A scale model of the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var>, the starship born of the blood, sweat, and tears of countless souls. From the bridge to the propulsion system, every part has been faithfully recreated in celebration of the original. And like the original, it ran its creators ragged from overwork.<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var>, engage! - Alphinaud<tab>Warp Speed<tab>Reduces minion summoning recast time by 50%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10s

Summon your blue-footed booby minion. A terror from beak to tailfeather.<tab>Formerly of Mistbeard's dread band, this merciless seabird was known for disarming its victims with its vacant gaze before pecking them into submission. But that's all in the past, and it has long since retired to a quiet life hopping between the isles of the southern seas.<tab>I heard some sky pirates go so far as to booby-trap their coffers. - Lyolf<tab>Soar<tab>Changes action party auto-attacks to area of effect attacks. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 12s

Summon your wind-up PuPu minion. Will bleed you dry of elixirs if you aren't careful.<tab>This automaton was created in the likeness of the alien PuPu by Godbert Manderville, who was inspired by the interstellar visitor's exquisite curves. It is programmed to follow you on your adventures, and has a curious fondness for elixirs.<tab>Pu...Pu? - Hildibrand<tab>PuPu Salute<tab>Instantly restores damaged ally Shield.

Призовите своего миньона игрушечного Сола. Ни одна земля не должна остаться вне его власти. Идите же только вперёд. Завоёвывайте. Властвуйте.<tab>Созданный по образу и подобию Сол зос Гальва, отца-основателя Гарлеанской империи, этот автоматон был создан в королевских мастерских в честь девятой годовщины его восхождения. Несколько единиц было отправлено в провинции в качестве демонстрации технологического мастерства нации.<tab>Я должен вздохнуть. —Сол зос Гальв<tab>Щелчок пальцами<tab>Переносит участника действия к центральным вратам призыва.

Призовите своего очаровательного удачливого пушка. Его присутствие — ваш подарок, и это всё, что вы получите за паши усилия от этого неторопливого островного маммета.<tab>Новейшая модель шарлеанских автоматов, разработанная для работы в экспедициях на необитаемых островах. Согласно исследованиям, каждый пятый маммет-рабочий на самом деле не работает, и поэтому был разработан этот маммет, для того что бы он бездельничал. В конце концов, статистика не врёт, и кто-то должен восполнять коэффициент безделья.<tab>Ба Го знал, что кто-то будет бездельничать. —Аколит Ба Го<tab>Разговорчики<tab>Уменьшает очки действия всех врагов в радиусе действия на 50% от максимального значения.

Summon your lumini minion. This floating ball of fleshy horror was modeled after an Ea who failed to regain full corporeality.<tab>A Stigma-4 product, manufactured as a warning for those Ea who might rush into attaining a fleshly vessel before properly recalling the shape of their corporeal form. For those yearning to experience the taste of ice cream, however, the reward may be worth the risks...<tab>Oh, what I would not give to don proper fleshy raiments once more before I pass into the void! - Envious Ea<tab>Disassemble<tab>Doubles the amount of HP restored to allies stationed in Gates. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 20s

Summon your clockwork crimson chaser minion. Painted a sleek shade of red, this miniature machina is a scale replica of the full-size model deployed in military training exercises.<tab>An Ironworks machina enthusiast has replicated the Astragalos cruise chaser in tiny, toylike form. Originally intended for a wider market, a refusal to compromise on the inclusion of a transformation function led to exorbitant production costs and a repurposing to allied training trophy.<tab>Ah, there I go, getting carried away as usual! - Warmachina Fanatic<tab>Transform<tab>Increases action party movement speed by 30%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10s

Summon your clockwork cerulean chaser minion. Painted a stylish shade of blue, this miniature machina is a scale replica of the full-size model deployed in military training exercises.<tab>An Ironworks machina enthusiast has replicated the Astragalos cruise chaser in tiny, toylike form. Originally intended for a wider market, a refusal to compromise on the inclusion of a transformation function led to exorbitant production costs and a repurposing to allied training trophy.<tab>It's the support of fans such as yourself that make this such a worthwhile hobby. - Warmachina Fanatic<tab>Transform<tab>Increases action party movement speed by 30%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10s

Summon your wind-up Scarmiglione minion. Is that hooded gaze regarding you with affection or insatiable hunger? Hard to tell.<tab>The archfiend of earth commanded this likeness of himself be crafted that it might keep his underlings in a state of terrified subjugation. Needless to say, when this stunted and strangely adorable homunculus was unveiled, its creator was promptly devoured.<tab>Hissssss... Your aether is mine! - Scarmiglione<tab>Tentacle Lash<tab>Delivers 5% damage to the nearest enemy Arcana Stone.

Summon your Ryunosuke minion. Awww, he thinks he's dragons!<tab>As part of her efforts to introduce the noble ryu, one of the totem animals to usher in a new year in the Far East, the ryu bugyo arranged for this chocobo hatchling to serve as a mascot. For its part, the creature seems to enjoy its role, and wears its outfit with adorable zeal.<tab>Yes, I can feel the presence of mighty dragons all around us! - Ohl Deeh<tab>The Dragon's Blessing<tab>Removes all detrimental effects from all allies within range.

Summon your pterosquirrel minion. Despite its chubby appearance, this bright-eyed companion can glide a surprising distance.<tab>A relative of the more common ground squirrel, the pterosquirrel can comfortably glide up to forty yalms through the air thanks to the membranes of skin attached between foreleg and hind limb. Useful for escaping predators or landing on unsuspecting faces.<tab>Seven hells, did those accursed squirrels leave any part of me untouched? - Arold<tab>Patagium Glide<tab>Renders all allies within range immune to attacks by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>monsters<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 5s

Призовите своего миньона — губку-силки. Единственная цель этого знакомого чистильщика размером с ладонь — оттирать всё до блеска: столешницы, доспехи, слуховые проходы и всё что угодно.<tab>Подчиняясь более крупным знакомым санитарам, оставшимся в подземелье Силь'ди, губка-силки способна создавать мыльное чистящее средство из воздуха. Она протиснет своё податливое тело в самые узкие щели и вычистит все нечистоты и грязь, продолжая работу, которую когда-то выполняла и в королевском дворце.<tab>Я — искатель грязи и преследователь чистоты. —Статная метла<tab>Время чистки<tab>Предоставляет действующей стороне иммунитет ко всем атакам от <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>кукол<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Длительность:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10 сек.

Summon your sewer skink minion. When it comes to keeping aqueducts free of creepy-crawlies, this lightning-tongued lizard is the hero of the day.<tab>Found dwelling deep in the Sil'dihn waterways, these skinks keep the stones clear of both mold and vilekin alike with quick lashes of their long, blue tongues─a service considered more valuable than that provided by any Sil'dihn royal guard's patrol.<tab>Why, I'd rather hire a sewer rat to mind my larder! - Milala<tab>Flickering Lick<tab>Inflicts a weakness to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>critters<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> on all enemies within range. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 15s

Summon your wind-up philos minion. By the by...you see it too, yes?<tab>There once was a man who shouldered a heavy responsibility in the capital of the star. In spite of this, he bore a name that made light of himself, and delighted in the simple things with his cherished friends. This mammet was made in his honor.<tab>Believe, and walk in faith. Let the light of your soul shine for all to see. - Loyal Friend<tab>Devotion<tab>Grants 10 action points to all allies within range who do not have similar actions.

Summon your wind-up Erichthonios minion. He'll get them all out. He must.<tab>This mammet depicting Erichthonios, a warder of Pandæmonium, was crafted in secret by a colleague impressed by his unyielding sense of duty. When one's workplace is overrun by the most violent manifestations of creation magicks, clutching tight to such a doll must keep the spark of hope alive.<tab>I-I'll save them! I...must... - Erichthonios<tab>Point Out<tab>Removes all beneficial effects from all enemies within range.

Summon your corgi minion. Fluffy, full of beans, and fit for a queen.<tab>A type of herding dog known for its short legs, the corgi is the result of breeding squat specimens that could avoid the hooves of livestock. In the old tongue of the northern seas, the name means “dwarf dog,” which, aside from the literal meaning, is a reference to a folktale that claims the creatures were once ridden by Lalafells.<tab>As if I would trail along behind you...like some sniveling lapdog... - Nero tol Scaeva<tab>Sit!<tab>Reduces DEF of all enemies within range by 50%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 15s

Born in the Cieldalaes. It was born in the Cieldalaes. It was born in the Cieldalaes. Born in the Cieldalaes. Summon your sky blue back minion.<tab>Hatched on an isle of the Cieldalaes, this young blue back was originally intended to be kept as livestock, but an excess of chicks led to it being rehomed. On account of belonging to a flightless species, it has a penchant for going on adventures off the island.<tab>Stickin' yer beak into me business again? - Blanstyr<tab>Surprise<tab>Reduces movement speed of all enemies within range by 50%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 5s

Summon your suzusaurus minion. Might be able to tow a rowboat to safety if not a galleon.<tab>Believed to be related to the legendary elasmosaurus, this young sea dragon had become separated from its herd when it encountered a submersible, which it decided to follow. Inquisitive by nature, it cranes its long neck to scout out its surroundings, and will not stray from whomever it considers its parent.<tab>I have a feeling everything is going to go swimmingly! - T'laqa Tia<tab>Waterspout<tab>Increases ATK of all allies within range by 25. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 6s

Summon your Mama automaton minion. Mama knows best. Listen to Mama.<tab>This diminutive automaton was in the possession of the wandering minstrel. It is said to be modeled after a mysterious creature called Mama, who guided a lone girl while pursuing thousands of stories and millions of dreams. Or something.<tab>You okay? Sure you're not going overboard? - Mama<tab>Mama's Help<tab>Reduces minion summoning recast time by 50%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10s

Summon your wind-up Cagnazzo minion. The puddles and ponds are his to command.<tab>In his single-minded pursuit of mighty foes, Cagnazzo tasked one of his minions with creating a being in his likeness. The result was this automaton, which, needless to say, disappointed the archfiend of water. Its maker was never seen again.<tab>You'd best not disappoint! - Cagnazzo<tab>Death Spin<tab>Renders all allies within range immune to attacks by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>poppets<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 5s

Summon your Findingway minion. Can find his own way without you, but chooses to tag along.<tab>Diminutive even among his brethren, this Loporrit was the last to awaken from his eons-long slumber. Although his mission was to survey the land, it has become his foremost passion to make new discoveries, and he shares the accounts of his journeys with everyone on the moon.<tab>There's a whole world out there to explore! - Shaggles<tab>Discovery<tab>Instantly restores damaged ally Shield.

Summon your private pachypodium minion. Its detonating days are thankfully over.<tab>Underling to Gancanagh, this pachypodium mine had hidden itself for an ambush, but it burrowed too deep into the ground and missed its chance to detonate. Subsequently released from military service, it appears to be enjoying its newfound freedom.<tab>Take care you are not caught in blassst. - Eshana<tab>◆◎◎※☆!<tab>Reduces HP of enemy Search Eye by 90%. No effect if Search Eye is already inoperable.

Summon your wind-up Halone minion. For those who like it icy cold.<tab>While traveling through the snow in search of awe-inspiring beauty, a goldsmith inadvertently wandered into the phantom realm. Though unsure if the cold had addled his mind, he later crafted this automaton based on the woman he glimpsed within, imbuing it with her imposing grace.<tab>You must do better than that against me! - Halone<tab>The Fury's Aegis<tab>Changes action party auto-attacks to area of effect attacks. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 12s

Summon your bantam train minion. It choo-choo-chooses to haunt you.<tab>This model train was assembled from mysterious parts salvaged from the bottom of the sea. Who it was meant to carry is unknown, but it is somehow tinged with a phantasmal air. Curiously, despite having no mechanism for self-propulsion, it tirelessly chugs along after you.<tab>Allow me to perform a locomotive experiment with this body shape. - Envious Ea<tab>Runaway Train<tab>Delivers an attack with a potency of 30 and knocks back all enemies within range.

Summon your wind-up Godbert minion. No less gentlemanly for its compact size, this mammet stands ever ready to do what only a Manderville can.<tab>Godbert Manderville, the realm's greatest goldsmith and distinguished proprietor of the Gold Saucer, created this automaton in his own likeness to serve as a prize for the Make It Rain event. It is guaranteed to enhance the gentlemanliness of anyone it accompanies.<tab>Splendidly suplexed, Lord Godbert! - Nashu Mhakaracca<tab>Manderville Drive<tab>Reduces HP of enemy Shield by 70%. No effect if Shield is already inoperable.

Summon your wind-up Aidoneus minion. If sighs could kill, you'd be dead a thousand times over.<tab>There once was a man whose ability to see and channel aether was unrivaled. With his singular talent, he kept watch over the Underworld, the place whereto all departed souls return, and solemnly served the star. This mammet was made in his honor.<tab>My ideals are inviolate. Invincible. - Unwavering Ancient<tab>Sigh<tab>Inflicts a weakness to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>poppets<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> on all enemies within range. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 15s

Summon your puffin minion. Wants to work smarter, not harder.<tab>Native to the northern seas, this seabird is distinguishable by its orange bill and feet. It swims effectively using its short wings in lieu of fins, and can catch several fish in a single dive. Having witnessed you vanquish fiends with ease, however, this creature decided to follow you in hopes of leading a comfortable life.<tab>Adventurers, you see, are as migratory birds in need of a place to rest their weary wings. - Antoinaut<tab>Wing Flap<tab>Grants action party the ability to deal extra damage to Arcana Stones. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 6s

Summon your mossasaurus minion. It's adorable now, but wait till it grows up.<tab>Encountered in distant seas, this dinosaur young belongs to a species named for its unhurried disposition. Though the creature may look adorable, it will one day grow to be a monstrous predator. Even now it is on the lookout for potential prey, which thankfully does not include you. Yet.<tab>Your eyes are starting to have the sharpness of a predator about them. - Hamon<tab>Hunt<tab>Increases caster ATK by 10 and DEF by 5 for every 5% of HP lost. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10s

Summon your okuri chochin minion. For those who like a little fright with their light.<tab>This small lantern ghost found in Mount Rokkon was born when a child's well-loved paper lantern came to harbor a spirit. Possessed of a friendly nature, it happily follows its master everywhere rather than misleading hapless souls in the dark as its kind are wont to do.<tab>You are the light that guidesss us, comrade. As such, I would have you prepare the lampsss we use for night patrol. - Eshana<tab>Terrifying Tongue<tab>Delivers an attack with a potency of 120 to all enemies within range while increasing action party ATK by 20. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 6s

Summon your posher otter minion. Part futuristic, part antiquated, all class.<tab>Believed to hail from the Far East, this otter was fishing out in the open sea when its boat capsized. Though it managed to find its way to a desert island, it was used as a test subject by automata and made to wear steam-powered wings and dapper attire.<tab>Speaking of steam, I think I feel some coming out my ears. - Regitt<tab>Steam Jump<tab>Delivers an attack 5 times the potency of the caster's ATK.

Summon your Rubellite Weapon minion. Scaled down or no, it can scratch you up good.<tab>Retrieved from an imperial base, this scale prototype of a warmachina appears to have been created for aerodynamics testing and carries no armaments. After completing their analysis, the Eorzean Alliance saw fit to bestow it upon members as a reward for exemplary service.<tab>Feast your eyes on the likeness of the Crimson Conqueror, the Vermilion Villain, the Scarlet...Scoundrel, the one and only Ruby Weapon! - Warmachina Fanatic<tab>Rubellite Dynamics<tab>Increases action party ATK by 40. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 15s

This adorable critter will make you love every ape that you see, from chimpan-a to chimpan-z. Summon your chimpanzee minion.<tab>A highly intelligent species of ape, the chimpanzee can be trained to use tools as well as simple language. Some naturalists believe them to be close relatives to mankind, but none have been able to determine an evolutionary process.<tab>May the fortune of the monkey attend you! - Saru Bugyo<tab>Munch<tab>Triggers an enemy trap as if it were your own. If the trap deals physical damage, then potency is increased by 150%.

Summon your exciting dynamite minion. For those who love the threat of death or serious injury to follow their every step.<tab>While this dynamite young is determined to do what it was born to do─detonate spectacularly and engulf all in a fiery conflagration─it is thankfully some ways away from accomplishing the deed. According to Thrillingway, there is no thrill quite like using it in place of a pillow when sleeping.<tab>Take care you are not caught in blassst. I would be upssset to lose a helpful adventurer sssuch as you. - Eshana<tab>Play Detonate<tab>Disarms deployed enemy traps.

Summon your mikra Lyssa minion. Definitely meant to be a wolf─the ancients said so.<tab>Made in the likeness of the bipedal wolf Lyssa, this automaton was apparently used to test the creation's viability at smaller proportions. While it is skilled at various striking and grappling techniques, the effect is commensurate with its diminutive size.<tab>Give us a hand and we'll get out of your hair. Wolf's honor. - The Wolf Burglar<tab>Rolling Sobat<tab>Reduces HP of closest enemy Gate by 90%. No effect if Gate is already inoperable.

Summon your Shiromaru minion. Because the only thing that's better than a dog is a <var 1A 02 /var>ninja<var 1A 01 /var> dog.<tab>This white ninja dog once served the Hingan kunoichi Yozakura. Driven by a keen sense of duty, he decided to follow you in gratitude for laying his mistress's soul to rest. Written upon the scroll he carries is an ancient ninjutsu technique for parting people from their treats.<tab>Shinobi are trained to put duty ahead of all else. - Oboro<tab>Dogged Duty<tab>Increases DEF of all allies within range by 10 (30 if the ally is a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>critter<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>). <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 6s

Summon your wind-up Athena minion. To follow you everywhere─<var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> is her wish.<tab>Boasting the likeness of Athena, the first chief keyward of Pandæmonium, this automaton was created in secret by a colleague who greatly admired her. That colleague later vanished without a trace, some days after which a peculiar dog with a man's face is said to have appeared in the facility.<tab>Athena must be the sole focus of your attention. - Lahabrea<tab>Lure<tab>Sets a trap that, when triggered, reduces the movement speed of all enemies within range by 70%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 20s <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Activation Delay:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10s

Summon your wind-up Barbariccia minion. Will blow you away─figuratively.<tab>Assuming the likeness of Barbariccia, one of Golbez's four archfiends, this automaton was made according to a blueprint devised by a goldsmith who chanced to witness her. Wishing to share the voidsent queen's unique beauty with others, the artisan focused on capturing her flowing hair and savage grace.<tab>B-Barbariccia... She is come! - Ciriatto<tab>Hair Raid<tab>Removes all effects from all enemies and allies within range.

Summon your goggle-eyed dogu minion. Guaranteed to win any staring contest.<tab>Retrieved from the bottom of the sea, this mysterious clay figurine is entirely hollow and moves by means of magic. While scholars believe that it was used in some manner of ritual during the Second Astral Era, others such as Delion of <var 1A 02 /var>The Thavnairian Truth<var 1A 01 /var> fame are convinced it was made in the image of an alien.<tab>Who would have thought that the answer to our prayers would be found in ancient pottery of all places? - Zlatan<tab>Dogu Power<tab>Renders ally Gates, Shield, and Search Eyeimpervious to damage. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 20s

Summon your Kuromaru minion. Because the only thing that's better than a dog is a <var 1A 02 /var>ninja<var 1A 01 /var> dog.<tab>This black ninja dog once served the Hingan kunoichi Yozakura. As compassionate as he is loyal, he refused to forsake his mistress even after she had turned into an abomination, and chooses to travel with you as part of a pilgrimage dedicated to her soul.<tab>Nothing short of death will cause a shinobi to forsake his mission. - Oboro<tab>Dogged Devotion<tab>Delivers an attack with a potency of 60 to all enemies within range while reducing movement speed by 70%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10s

Summon your uolosapa minion. To fly after you and perch prettily on your head is its divine calling.<tab>One cannot talk about the creatures of the south sea isles without mentioning this pink-beaked sparrow. Since ancient times, its kind have been revered as sacred, and legend speaks of an especially intelligent and friendly specimen that considered itself a servant of the Speaker.<tab>I seem to have made a feathered friend. - Fufucha<tab>Southern Wind<tab>Removes all effects from all enemies and allies within range.

Summon your Tourmaline Weapon minion. Stands ready to lend you a helping hand or six.<tab>Retrieved from an imperial base, this scale prototype of a warmachina appears to have been created for heat resistance testing and carries no armaments. After completing their analysis, the Eorzean Alliance saw fit to bestow it upon members as a reward for exemplary service.<tab>Emeralds will do quite nicely. - Crystal Merchant<tab>Tourmaline Beam<tab>Removes all beneficial effects from all enemies within range.

Summon your wind-up Oschon minion. Guaranteed not to wander off on you.<tab>Upon seeing the manmade wind-up Halone, Nald'thal was taken by a bout of mischievousness and decided to create an automaton of his own using a jewel buried in the earth. While the resultant product assumes the likeness of Oschon, unlike the deity upon whom it is based, it follows its master faithfully rather than wandering freely.<tab>He's fond of wandering wheresoever his whims take him... - Krile<tab>Wanderlust<tab>Increases action party ATK by 40. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 15s

Summon your Kydonia Strolls minion. For when you need a stony face to stare at you unflinchingly.<tab>This hovering sculpture was made in the likeness of Kydonia Knolls, a peculiar rock formation on the moon's surface resembling a face. Seeking to promote it as a sightseeing destination, a Loporrit asked Khloe Aliapoh to distribute the objects, which occasionally glow with the moonlight that they supposedly harbor.<tab>The kindness in your heart shines like moonlight on oiled skin. - Company Muscle<tab>Moony Smile<tab>Delivers an attack with a potency of 80 to all enemies within range while reducing DEF by 13%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 6s

Summon your vicarious vacationer minion. A lean, mean, holidaying machine.<tab>This Sharlayan-made automaton was provided to aid in your work on your island sanctuary. An industrious new model, it has been programmed to enjoy its vacation as efficiently and effectively as possible to maximize average rest and relaxation amongst your island workforce.<tab>Next you'll be telling me you're one of the Warriors of Light, back from a half-decade long holiday! - Mother Miounne<tab>Holiday Spirit<tab>Sets a trap that, when triggered, delivers an attack with a potency of 260 to all enemies within range. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Activation Delay:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10s

Summon your wind-up Golbez minion. Too small to conceive of and carry out a mass invasion of the Source...or is he?<tab>This automaton modeled after Golbez was discovered in his domain in the depths of the Thirteenth's moon. Perhaps created by one of the black-clad knight's loyal minions, it boasts peerless attention to detail, and exudes an unshakable resolve─albeit on a diminutive scale.<tab>Golbez? Of course I know of him. Only a fool without ears wouldn't. - Fearful Voidsent<tab>Flames of Eventide<tab>Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies within range.

Summon your Torgal pup minion. Go on, you know you want to pet the adorable fellow. What could possibly go wrong...?<tab>According to the wandering minstrel, the beast who appeared to aid the stranded Clive was a guiding spirit born of its master's memory. So impressed was the ever-insightful musician by the creature, he decided to recreate a young version of it, which, despite its diminutive size, already possesses the indomitable spirit of the fine hound it will one day become.<tab>What an adorable little puppy you have! - Hildibrand<tab>Mighty Yip<tab>Inflicts a weakness to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>critters<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> on all enemies within range. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 15s

Summon your pink Bean minion. Three, two, one...GO!<tab>Little is known about these mysterious life-forms that suddenly appeared in the Gold Saucer apart from the fact that they love to race, and this specimen has apparently decided that it wants to race you without end. Rumor has it that underneath its rotund exterior is a skeleton that looks like a nightmarish amalgam of man and bird, but there is no ready way to determine the truth.<tab>Let me guess. You've lost...no, broken...no, <var 1A 02 /var>traded for magical beans<var 1A 01 /var> the parts we need. - Jessie<tab>Eliminate<tab>Knocks back all enemies within range.

Summon your Pegwin minion. You chased after it; now it chases after you.<tab>Suddenly appearing in the Gold Saucer alongside the Beans, these winsome little automata love nothing more than being in the thick of a race and chased around like a prize. Rumor has it they were created by a friend of the Beans, who was inspired by a penguin they had witnessed somewhere out there.<tab>My, what charming little toys. - Kan-E-Senna<tab>Scurry<tab>Disarms deployed enemy traps.

Summon your Hydaelyn idol minion. When you ask your mother if you can have Hydaelyn, but she says you already have Hydaelyn at home.<tab>This automaton was inspired by Hydaelyn as She was depicted in an ancient cave mural. Held to be the will of the star and the embodiment of Light, She guided many a mortal soul in Her age-old conflict with Her bitter rival Zodiark, whom She divided into fourteen parts with─if the artist is to be believed─a mighty kick.<tab>Please, Mother Hydaelyn! Hearken to our plea! Lend us Your divine Light! - Minfilia<tab>Blessing of Light<tab>Increases ATK of all allies within range by 25. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 6s

Summon your Zodiark idol minion. When you ask your mother if you can have Zodiark, but she says you already have Zodiark at home.<tab>This automaton was inspired by Zodiark as He was depicted in an ancient cave mural. Held to be the embodiment of Darkness, He is worshipped by the Ascians, who seek to rejoin the sundered world. Even twelve millennia after His defeat at the hands (or feet) of His bitter rival Hydaelyn, His grudge towards Her burns strong.<tab>For the glory of Lord Zodiark. - Igeyorhm<tab>Blessing of Darkness<tab>Binds all enemies within range. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 5s

Summon your wind-up Fourchenault minion. Don't even think about dragging it into conflict, or it shall give you a look of sternest disapproval.<tab>A veritable congress of these automata was produced as part of a public relations drive for the Forum. However, a complaint from their unwitting model led to the units being consigned to the storehouse, and it was only later at the scholarch's orders that they now see the light of day as promotional items for an academic publication.<tab>Gods know Fourchenault's a cranky old goat, so I'm sure you butt heads often enough. - Theopauldin<tab>Sensible Leadership<tab>Renders all allies within range immune to attacks by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>critters<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 5s

Summon your wind-up Zidane minion. Despite appearances, he isn't one for monkeying around.<tab>Once upon a time, there lived a debonair youth who belonged to a band of thieves masquerading as a theater troupe. Legend holds that he and his fellows set out to kidnap a royal princess─an act that led him to embark upon a quest to ensure the very survival of the star.<tab>You don't need a reason. - Zidane<tab>What's That!?<tab>Changes action party auto-attacks to area of effect attacks. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 12s

Summon your repulu minion. Comes complete with a fetching bow tie to prevent misplacement.<tab>Its name meaning “honored lizard,” this reptile native to Aloalo Island is believed by the locals to be a fountain spirit that brings good fortune to those who accord it due reverence. Whatever the truth of their nature, this particular critter was so impressed with your prowess in battle, it chose to follow you wherever you should go.<tab>Most colorful, would you not agree? - Hinageshi<tab>Swift Tongue<tab>Reduces ATK of all enemies within range by 40%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 6s
